remarks: Selecting one statement from a disjunction if one of the disjuncted statements is false.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Sep-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 13-Oct-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 19-Jan-2020.)
statement: ornld $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( ph -> ( th \/ ta ) ) /\ -. th ) -> ta ) ) $.
